>
[Hail of Arrows Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=335)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=146" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 590 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When a creature enters the snare’s square, it releases hundreds upon hundreds of carefully prepared arrows, blanketing a 20-foot radius around the snare’s square with massive arrow fire that deals 18d6 piercing damage. Creatures in the area must attempt a DC 37 basic Reflex saving throw.
